lexUnit.name: batch.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a quantity or consignment of goods produced at one time

sentence.text: The decision to ` expel " the first batch of embassy refugees to the West was a ` humanitarian act " done in the interests of the many children involved and to avoid epidemics .
